alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 1:34PM MST until December 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Bennett County, Jackson County and Oglala Lakota County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
